data.name: The Build And Race Hotrod Game Demo
data.detailed_description:
build and race a hotrod car ,use a truck and a forklift to pick up parts from a waiting train.Drive on narrow and demanding mountain roads
build hotrod in workshop pick up parts with a crain and assemble hotrod compete with your hotrod in a race
data.about_the_game:
build and race a hotrod car ,use a truck and a forklift to pick up parts from a waiting train.Drive on narrow and demanding mountain roads
build hotrod in workshop pick up parts with a crain and assemble hotrod compete with your hotrod in a race
data.short_description: build and race a hotrod .first you pick up parts from a waiting train using a forklift .assemble car in a workshop using a crain.drive to raceway an compete with your car

fullgame.name: The Build And Race Hotrod Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: intel 5
  • Graphics: geforce 770
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: intel 7
  • Graphics: geforce 770 sli
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
